other_tests.findings: Blood cultures were drawn but the lesion had no drainage to culture.
The wound did not reveal any pus; a wick was placed.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Mr. M was slowly improving with intravenous vancomycin and levofloxacin after the procedure.

other_tests.findings: The wound culture grew MRSA. The species was sensitive to gentamicin, levofloxacin, rifampin, tetracycline, trimethoprim-sulfamethoxazole, and vancomycin.
